item.title: Lecture notes to the forecast course
item.description: Forecasting course by Rob Hyndman in (TU/e, October 19-21, 2016) 1. Requred packages library(fpp) library(ggplot2) library(magrittr) library(readxl) library(thief) library(knitr) Considered models are good for cyclic/seasonal data. Plot ACF/PCF to check seasonality. Lecture’s slides [1] are extremely useful. ARIMA learning procedure To learn coefficient’s values a non-linear optimization to maximize likelihood is used. To find p,d,q orders of ARIMA(p,d,q) the R command auto.arima() is used. AIC/BIC criterya is used to choose the best model.
